name: warframe-status
description: Warframe status serves as an API for Warframe community projects

CACHE_TIMEOUT.description: How long to wait to fetch a new instance of the worldstate

TWITTER_TIMEOUT.description: Milliseconds between each request batch to Twitter.

TWITTER_KEY.description: Consumer key for Twitter API Access.

TWITTER_SECRET.description: Consumer secret for Twitter API Access.

TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN.description: Application-only bearer token for Twitter API Access
